data.event: Monroe was founded in 1818 as seat of the newly formed Walton County.

event.title: was incorporated as a town in 1821

data.event: It was incorporated as a town in 1821 and as a city in 1896.

event.title: Now the mills no longer produce

data.event: Now the mills no longer produce for the cotton industry, but rather serve as economic engines for the region by showcasing premiere antique markets, event space, and other unique retail.
